summary: In the far reaches of space, a small crew, 20 years into their solitary mission, find things beginning to go hilariously wrong.
cast: Brian Narelle|Cal Kuniholm|Dre Pahich|Dan O'Bannon|Adam Beckenbaugh|John Carpenter|Nick Castle|Cookie Knapp|Joe Saunders|Alan Sheretz|Miles Watkins
title: Estrella oscura
